Sentence.value: For about 4 - 6 weeks avoid: - Douching (douching should never be done) - Sexual intercourse - Using tampons For 2 - 3 weeks after the procedure, you may have discharge that is: - Bloody - Heavy - Yellow-colored
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: For about 4 - 6 weeks avoid: - [[Douching|C0022100]] (douching should never be done) - Sexual intercourse - Using [[tampons|C0039288]] For 2 - 3 weeks after the procedure, you may have discharge that is: - Bloody - Heavy - Yellow-colored

Sentence.value: Cold knife cone biopsy is done to detect cervical cancer or early changes that lead to cancer.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Cold knife cone biopsy|C0195324]] is done to detect [[cervical cancer|C0007847]] or early changes that lead to cancer.
